Notice:
道路交通（交通管制）規例（第374G章）
西區吉席街臨時公共小巴限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月31日午夜12時起至2024年11月20日晚上11時59分止，吉席街由其與爹核士街交界以東約15米處起，至同一交界以東約25米處止的北面路旁行車線，將每日上午7時至午夜12時暫劃為公共小巴限制區。

除經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，公共小巴司機一律禁止在限制區內 ：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

同時，現時每日上午7時至上午10時及下午4時至晚上7時在上述路段實施的公共小巴限制區，將暫予撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Public Light Bus Restricted Zone at Catchick Street, Western District


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 12.00 midnight on 31 May 2024 to 11.59 pm on 20 November 2024, the northern kerbside lane of Catchick Street from a point about 15 metres east from its junction with Davis Street to a point about 25 metres east of the same junction will be temporarily designated as a public light bus restricted zone from 7.00 am to 12.00 midnight daily.

Within the restricted zone, drivers of public light buses, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a)  Picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)  Loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

        At the same time, the existing public light bus restricted zone from 7.00 am to 10.00 am and from 4.00 pm to 7.00 pm daily on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

        除專利巴士、的士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zone in Lam Hing Street, Kowloon Bay


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 5 July 2024, the northern kerbside lane of Lam Hing Street from a point about 15 metres east of its junction with Wang Chui Road to a point about 75 metres east of the same junction will be designated as restricted zones from 7.00 am to 7.00 pm daily (except General Holidays) .


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses, taxi and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone from 7.00 am to 7.00 pm daily (except General Holidays) on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
天后臨時公共小巴限制區

        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年4月24日上午10時至2024年10月23日上午10時止，琉璃街由其與銀幕街（北行）交界起，至同一交界以東約10米處止南面路旁行車線，每日上午7時至午夜12時暫劃為公共小巴限制區。

除經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，公共小巴司機一律禁止在限制區內 ：

(a) 上落乘客；或

(b) 起卸貨物。

有關地點將設置適當交通標誌，表明限制區範圍。

同時，現時在上述路段實施的公共小巴限制區，將暫予撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Public Light Bus Restricted Zone In Tin Hau

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 24 April 2024 to 10.00 am on 23 October 2024, the southern kerbside lane of Lau Li Street from its junction with Ngan Mok Street (northbound) to a point about 10 metres east of the same junction will be temporarily designated as a public light bus restricted zone from 7.00 am to 12.00 midnight daily.

        Within the restricted zone, drivers of public light buses, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a) picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b) loading or unloading goods.

The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs.

At the same time, the existing public light bus restricted zone on the above road section will continue to be temporarily rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例 (第374G章)
延長九龍城協調道臨時限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月30日下午6時01分起，至2024年11月30日下午6時止，協調道由其與世運道交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的南面路旁行車線，全日24小時繼續暫劃為限制區。



        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (Chapter 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zone on Concorde Road, Kowloon City


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.01 p.m. on 30 June 2024 to 6.00 p.m. on 30 November 2024, the southern kerbside lane of Concorde Road from its junction with Olympic Avenue to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction will continue to be temporarily designated as a restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from: -


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone has been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road sections will continue to be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
紅磡鶴園街臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月6日上午10時起，至2024年8月31日下午5時止，下列路段將全日24小時暫劃為限制區：


(a)     鶴園街由其與崇志街交界處起，至同一交界以東約85米處止的北面路旁行車線；及

(b)     鶴園街由其與馬頭圍道交界以東約55米處起，至同一交界以東約160米處止的南面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones in Hok Yuen Street, Hung Hom


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 6 May 2024 to 5.00 pm on 31 August 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from its junction with Sung Chi Street to a point about 85 metres east of the same junction; and

(b)     the southern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from a point about 55 metres east of its junction with Ma Tau Wai Road to a point about 160 metres east of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones in Hok Yuen Street, Hung Hom


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 21 June 2024 to 5.00 pm on 31 October 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from its junction with Sung Chi Street to a point about 85 metres east of the same junction; and

(b)     the southern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from a point about 55 metres east of its junction with Ma Tau Wai Road to a point about 160 metres east of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
新蒲崗大有街及六合街限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年4月15日上午10時起，以下路段將全日24小時劃為限制區：

(a)     大有街由其與六合街交界處起，至同一交界以北約20米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(b)     大有街由其與六合街交界處起，至同一交界以南約30米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(c)     六合街由其與大有街交界處起，至同一交界以東約25米處止的南面路旁行車線；及

(d)     六合街由其與大有街交界處起，至同一交界以東約20米處止的北面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

Restricted Zones on Tai Yau Street and Luk Hop Street, San Po Kong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 15 April 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the eastern kerbside lane of Tai Yau Street from its junction with Luk Hop Street to a point about 20 metres north of the same junction;

(b)     the eastern kerbside lane of Tai Yau Street from its junction with Luk Hop Street to a point about 30 metres south of the same junction;

(c)     the southern kerbside lane of Luk Hop Street from its junction with Tai Yau Street to a point about 25 metres east of the same junction; and

(d)     the northern kerbside lane of Luk Hop Street from its junction with Tai Yau Street to a point about 20 metres east of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic sign and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Temporary Restricted Zone on Granville Square, Tsim Sha Tsui


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 2 July 2024 to 6.00 pm on 31 January 2025, Granville Square will be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月30日晚上8時01分起，至2024年9月30日晚上8時止，常樂街由其與常和街交界以南約190米處起，至同一交界以南約320米處止的路段，全日24小時繼續暫劃為限制區。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zone in Sheung Lok Street, Ho Man Tin


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 8.01 pm on 30 June 2024 to 8.00 pm on 30 September 2024, the section of Sheung Lok Street from a point about 190 metres south of its junction with Sheung Wo Street to a point about 320 metres south of the same junction will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone has been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will continue be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

撤銷半山西摩道限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年1月25日下午6時起，現時全日24小時在西摩道由其與衛城道交界以西約120米處起，至同一交界以西約140米處止的南面路旁行車線實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Rescission of Restricted Zone on Seymour Road, Mid-Levels

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 p.m. on 25 January 2024, the existing restricted zone 24 hours daily on the southern kerbside lane of Seymour Road from a point about 120 metres west of its junction with Castle Road to a point about 140 metres west of the same junction will be rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通（交通管制） 規例（第374G章）
中環美利道臨時限制區

        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年3月29日至2024年8月31日期間，以下路段將全日24小時暫劃為限制區：

(a)  美利道由其與琳寶徑交界以南約5米處起，至同一交界以南約90米處止的東面路旁行車線；及
(b)  美利道由其與紅棉路交界以西約25米處起，至同一交界以西約95米處止的北面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機及私家小巴一律禁止在限制區內 ：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

        同時，現時上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones on Murray Road, Central


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 29 March 2024 to 31 August 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:

(a)  the eastern kerbside lane of Murray Road from a point about 5 metres south of its junction with Lambeth Walk to a point about 90 metres south of the same junction; and
(b)  the northern kerbside lane of Murray Road from a point about 25 metres west of its junction with Cotton Tree Drive to a point about 95 metres west of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles and private light buses, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a)  Picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)  Loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
九龍塘聯福道臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年3月11日上午10時起，至2024年8月31日下午6時止，聯福道由其與禧福道交界以北約75米處起，至同一交界以北約165米處止的東面路旁行車線，將全日24小時暫劃為限制區。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zone on Renfrew Road, Kowloon Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 11 March 2024 to 6.00 pm on 31 August 2024, the eastern kerbside of Renfrew Road from a point about 75 metres north of its junction with Hereford Road to a point about 165 metres north of the same junction will be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年2月29日下午6時起，至2024年8月31日下午6時止，九龍道介乎青山道與僑蔭街之間的路段，全日24小時繼續暫劃為限制區。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zone on Kowloon Road, Sham Shui Po


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 p.m. on 29 February 2024 to 6.00 p.m. on 31 August 2024, the section of Kowloon Road between Castle Peak Road and Kiu Yam Street will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone has been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will continue to be temporarily rescinded.


HO Kwong-hang, Patrick Commissioner for Transport (Acting)

九龍城沐泰街限制區

　　本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由 2019年2月1日下午2時起，九龍城沐泰街將每日由上午7時至午夜12時劃為限制區。

　　除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a) 上落乘客；或
(b) 起卸貨物。

　　有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

運輸署署長陳美寶

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374)

 Restricted Zone in Muk Tai Street, Kowloon City

　　In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374, I hereby direct that with effect from 2.00 pm on 1 February 2019, Muk Tai Street, Kowloon City will be designated a restricted zone from 7.00 am to 12.00 midnight daily.

　　Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a)　picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)　loading or unloading goods.

　　The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

CHAN Mable Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
尖沙咀信義街臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月3日上午8時起至2024年8月31日下午6時止，信義街由其與金巴利街交界處起，至同一交界以南約30米處止的路段，將劃為全日24小時限制區。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內:


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zone in Shun Yee Street, Tsim Sha Tsui


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 8.00 a.m. on 3 June 2024 to 6.00 pm on 31 August 2024, Shun Yee Street from its junction with Kimberly Street to a point about 30 metres south of the same junction will be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road section will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374章)

荔枝角限制區

     本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2017年8月12日上午6時起，荔枝角的下列路段，全日24小時劃為限制區：

(a) 長沙灣道由其與大南西街交界處起，至同一交界以西約35米處止的北面路旁行車線；及

(b) 大南西街由其與長沙灣道交界處起，至同一交界以北約15米處止的西面路旁行車線。

     除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a) 上落乘客；或

(b) 起卸貨物。

     有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

     同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。

署理運輸署署長李萃珍

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374)

Restricted Zones in Lai Chi Kok

     In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 am on 12 August 2017, the following road sections in Lai Chi Kok will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-

(a) the northern kerbside lane of Cheung Sha Wan Road from its junction with Tai Nan West Street to a point about 35 metres west of the same junction; and

(b) the western kerbside lane of Tai Nan West Street from its junction with Cheung Sha Wan Road to a point about 15 metres north of the same junction.

     Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a) picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b) loading or unloading goods.

     The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

     At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.

LEE Sui-chun, Macella Commissioner for Transport (Acting)

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
延長尖沙咀臨時限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月26日下午6時起，至2024年10月28日下午6時止，下列路段將繼續劃為全日24小時限制區:-


(i)     介乎金馬倫道及漆咸圍之間的漆咸道南西面路旁行車線；

(ii)    天文臺道由其漆咸道南交界處起，至同一交界以西約40米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(iii)   天文臺道由其漆咸道南交界處起，至同一交界以西約30米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(iv)   加連威老道由其與漆咸道南交界處起，至同一交界以西約120米處止的路段；

(v)    嘉蘭圍由其與加連威老道交界處起，至同一交界以南約10米處止的東面路旁行車線；及

(vi)   嘉蘭圍由其與加連威老道交界處起，至同一交界以南約5米處止的西面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內:


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zones in Tsim Sha Tsui


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 pm on 26 May 2024 to 6.00 pm on 28 October 2024, the following road sections will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(i)     the western kerbside lane of Chatham Road South between Chatham Court and Cameron Road;

(ii)    the northern kerbside lane of Observatory Road from its junction with Chatham Road South to a point about 40 metres west of the same junction;

(iii)   the southern kerbside lane of Observatory Road from its junction with Chatham Road South to a point about 30 metres west of the same junction;

(iv)   the section of Granville Road from its junction with Chatham Road South to a point about 120 metres west of the same junction;

(v)    the eastern kerbside lane of Granville Circuit from its junction with Granville Road to a point about 10 metres south of the same junction; and

(vi)   the western kerbside lane of Granville Circuit from its junction with Granville Road to a point about 5 metres south of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones have been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road section will continue to be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

撤銷黃大仙東頭村道限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月10日上午10時起，現時於東頭村道由其與聯合道交界以東約130米處起，至同一交界以東約165米處止的南面路旁行車線實施的全日24小時限制區，將予以撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Rescission of Restricted Zone on Tung Tau Tsuen Road, Wong Tai Sin


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulations 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 10 May 2024, the restricted zone designated 24 hours daily at the southern kerbside lane of Tung Tau Tsuen Road from a point about 130 metres east of its junction with Junction Road to a point about 165 meters east of the same junction will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
深水埗南昌街及基隆街限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年3月28日下午2時起，下列路段全日24小時劃為限制區：


(a)     南昌街北行由其與基隆街交界以南約15米處起，至同一交界以北約10米處止的路段；及

(b)     基隆街由其與南昌街交界處起，至同一交界以西約15米處止的路段。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones in Nam Cheong Street and Ki Lung Street, Sham Shui Po


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 2.00 p.m. on 28 March 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the section of Nam Cheong Street northbound from a point about 15 metres south of its junction with Ki Lung Street to a point about 10 metres north of the same junction; and

(b)     the section of Ki Lung Street from its junction with Nam Cheong Street to a point about 15 metres west of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
何文田巴富街臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年7月2日上午8時起至2024年8月17日下午6時止，下列路段將全日24小時暫劃為限制區：


(a)     巴富街由其與石鼓街(西行)交界處起，至同一交界以西約50米處止的路段；及

(b)     巴富街由其與石鼓街(西行)交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的北面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones in Perth Street, Ho Man Tin


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 8.00 am on 2 July 2024 to 6.00 pm on 17 August 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the section of Perth Street from its junction with Shek Ku Street westbound to a point about 50 metres west of the same junction; and

(b)     the northern kerbside lane of Perth Street from its junction with Shek Ku Street westbound to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通 (交通管制) 規例 (第374章，附屬法例G)
寶馬山限制區

        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374章，附屬法例G)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2023 年 8月 18 日上午10時起，下列路段將全日 24 小時劃為限制區：

(a)  校園徑由其與寶馬山道交界處起，至同一交界以西約40米處止的南面路旁行車線;

(b)  校園徑由其與寶馬山公共運輸交匯處的最西面路旁通道交界處起，至同一交界以西約15米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(c)  寶馬山公共運輸交匯處的最西面路旁通道由其與校園徑交界處起，至同一交界以北約15米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(d)  毗鄰寶馬山公共運輸交匯處的未命名通路由其與校園徑交界處起，至其與寶馬山道交界處止的東面路旁行車線；

(e)  寶馬山道由其與校園徑交界處起，至同一交界以北約20米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(f)  寶馬山道由其與校園徑交界處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的西面路旁行車線；及

(g)  寶馬山道由其與校園徑交界以北約20米處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的東面路旁行車線。

        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸貨物。

        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。

署理運輸署署長李萃珍
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (Chapter 374 SUB. LEG. G)
Restricted Zones in Braemar Hill

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374 sub. leg. G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 a.m. on 18 August 2023, the following road sections will be designated restricted zones 24 hours daily:-

(a)  The southern kerbside lane of Hau Yuen Path from its junction with Braemar Hill Road to a point about 40 metres west of the same junction;

(b)  The northern kerbside lane of Hau Yuen Path from its junction with the western-most access of Braemar Hill Public Transport Interchange to a point about 15 metres west of the same junction;

(c)  The western kerbside lane of the western-most access of Braemar Hill Public Transport Interchange from its junction with Hau Yuen Path to a point about 15 metres north of the same junction;

(d)  The eastern kerbside lane of the unnamed access road adjacent to Braemar Hill Public Transport Interchange from its junction with Hau Yuen Path to its junction with Braemar Hill Road;

(e)  The western kerbside lane of Braemar Hill Road from its junction with Hau Yuen Path to a point about 20 metres north of the same junction;

(f)  The western kerbside lane of Braemar Hill Road from its junction with Hau Yuen Path to a point about 20 metres south of the same junction; and

(g)  The eastern kerbside lane of Braemar Hill Road from a point about 20 metres north of its junction with the Hau Yuen Path to a point about 20 metres south of the same junction.

        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:-

(a)  picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)  loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Sui Chun, Macella Commissioner for Transport (Acting)

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
延長臨時撤銷觀塘碼頭公共運輸交匯處限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月1日凌晨零時零分起，至2024年8月31日晚上11時59分止，現時在觀塘碼頭公共運輸交匯處東面起第二條輔助道路由其與偉業街交界以南約150米處起，至同一交界以南約165米處止的東面路旁行車線劃設的全日24小時限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Rescission of Restricted Zone in
Kwun Tong Ferry Pier Public Transport Interchange


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 0.00 am on 1 June 2024 to 11.59 pm on 31 August 2024, the existing restricted zone 24 hours daily designated on the eastern kerbside lane of the second easternmost service road in Kwun Tong Ferry Pier Public Transport Interchange from a point about 150 metres south of its junction with Wai Yip Street to a point about 165 metres south of the same junction will continue to be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

延長臨時撤銷觀塘碼頭公共運輸交匯處限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月1日凌晨零時零分起，至2024年8月31日晚上11時59分止，現時在觀塘碼頭公共運輸交匯處東面起第二條輔助道路由其與偉業街交界以南約150米處起，至同一交界以南約165米處止的東面路旁行車線劃設的全日24小時限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Rescission of Restricted Zone in
Kwun Tong Ferry Pier Public Transport Interchange


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 0.00 am on 1 June 2024 to 11.59 pm on 31 August 2024, the existing restricted zone 24 hours daily designated on the eastern kerbside lane of the second easternmost service road in Kwun Tong Ferry Pier Public Transport Interchange from a point about 150 metres south of its junction with Wai Yip Street to a point about 165 metres south of the same junction will continue to be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通 (交通管制) 規例（第374G章）
延續西區卑路乍街臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年4月19日下午6時01分至2024年8月15日下午6時期間，卑路乍街由其與荷蘭街交界以東約30米處起，至同一交界以東約50米處止的的北面路旁行車線將繼續每日24小時劃為限制區。

        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a) 上落乘客；或
(b) 起卸貨物。

        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zone at Belcher's Street, Western District

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.01 pm on 19 April 2023 to 6.00 pm on 15 August 2024, the northern kerbside lane of Belcher's Street from a point about 30 metres east of its junction with Holland Street to a point about 50 metres east of the same junction will continue to be designated as a restricted zone 24 hours daily.

        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:—

(a) picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b) loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
黃大仙豐盛街限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，由2024年5月24日上午10時起，下列路段全日24小時劃為限制區：


(i)     豐盛街由其與連接瓊麗苑的未命名通道交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(ii)    豐盛街由其與連接瓊麗苑的未命名通道交界處起，至同一交界以西約10米處止的南面路旁行車線；及

(iii)   連接瓊麗苑的未命名通道由其與豐盛街交界處起，至同一交界以南約10米處止的路段。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones on Fung Shing Street, Wong Tai Sin


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 24 May 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(i)     The southern kerbside lane of Fung Shing Street from its junction with the unnamed access road connecting to King Lai Court to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction;

(ii)    The southern kerbside lane of Fung Shing Street from its junction with the unnamed access road connecting to King Lai Court to a point about 10 metres west of the same junction; and

(iii)   The section of the unnamed access road connecting King Lai Court from its junction with Fung Shing Street to a point about 10 metres south of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
觀塘安茵街及安秀道限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月21日上午10時起，下列路段將劃為全日24小時限制區：


(a)     安茵街由其與安秀道南面交界以西約85米處起，至同一交界以 西約75米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(b)     安茵街由其與安秀道南面交界起，至同一交界以西約30米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(c     安茵街由其與勇泰樓旁的未命名通道交界以東約20米處起，至同一交界以西約35米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(d)     安茵街由其與安秀道南面交界處起，至同一交界以西約25米處止的南面路旁行車線；及

(e)     安秀道由其與安茵街南面交界以南約35米處起，至同一交界以北約30米處止的西面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones on On Yan Street and On Sau Road, Kwun Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10:00 am on 21 June 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of On Yan Street from a point about 85 meters west of its southern junction with On Sau Road to a point about 75 meters west of the same junction;

(b)     the northern kerbside lane of On Yan Street from its southern junction with On Sau Road to a point about 30 meters west of the same junction;

(c)     the southern kerbside lane of On Yan Street from a point about 20 meters east of its junction with the unnamed access road near Yung Tai House to a point about 35 meters west of the same junction;

(d)     the southern kerbside lane of On Yan Street from its southern junction with On Sau Road to a point about 25 meters west of the same junction; and

(e)     the western kerbside lane of On Sau Road from a point about 35 meters south of its southern junction with On Yan Street to a point around 30 meters north of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
長沙灣元州街及昌華街限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月19日下午10時起，下列路段全日24小時劃為限制區：


(a)     元州街由其與昌華街交界以東約25米處起，至同一交界以西約20米處止的路段；及

(b)     昌華街由其與元州街交界以北約25米處起，至同一交界以南約15米處止的路段。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones in Un Chau Street and Cheung Wah Street, Cheung Sha Wan


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 p.m. on 19 June 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the section of Un Chau Street from a point about 25 metres east of its junction with Cheung Wah Street to a point about 20 metres west of the same junction; and

(b)     the section of Cheung Wah Street from a point about 25 metres north of its junction with Un Chau Street to a point about 15 metres south of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
九龍灣臨福街限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年4月19日上午10時起，臨福街由其與宏泰道交界以東約50米處起，至同一交界以東約60米處止的南面路旁行車線，將每日上午7時至下午7時劃為限制區。


        除專利巴士、的士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zone in Lam Fook Street, Kowloon Bay


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 19 April 2024, the southern kerbside lane of Lam Fook Street from a point about 50 metres east of its junction with Wang Tai Road to a point about 60 metres east of the same junction will be designated as a restricted zone from 7.00 am to 7.00 pm daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses, taxi and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

啟德承啟道限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年2月23日上午10時起，以下路段將劃為全日24小時限制區：


(a)     連接德朗邨多層停車場出口的未命名道路由其與啟承道以西約20米處起，至同一交界以西約30米處止的北面路旁行車線；及

(b)     連接德朗邨多層停車場入口的未命名道路由其與啟承道以西約15米處起，至同一交界以西約30米處止的南面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。



署理運輸署署長何廣鏗

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zone in Shing Kai Road, Kai Tak


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 23 February 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of the unnamed access road connecting the egress of Tak Long Estate Multi-storey Car Park from a point about 20 metres west of its junction with Shing Kai Road to a point about 30 metres west of the same junction; and

(b)     the southern kerbside lane of the unnamed access road connecting the ingress of Tak Long Estate Multi-storey Car Park from a point about 15 metres west of its junction with Shing Kai Road to a point about 30 metres west of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

HO Kwong-hang, Patrick Commissioner for Transport (Acting)

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
延長紅磡鶴園街及崇志街臨時限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年3月1日凌晨零時起，至2024年7月31日下午11時59分止，以下路段將全日24小時繼續暫劃為限制區：


(a)     鶴園街由其與馬頭圍道交界以東約5米處起，至同一交界以東約60米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(b)     鶴園街由其與馬頭圍道交界以東約5米處起，至同一交界以東約75米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(c)     崇志街由其與鶴園街交界處起，至同一交界以北約10米處止的路段；及

(d)     鶴園街由其與崇志街交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的北面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。


署理運輸署署長何廣鏗

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zones in Hok Yuen Street and Sung Chi Street, Hung Hom


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 12.00 midnight on 1 March 2024 to 11.59 pm on 31 July 2024, the following road sections will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from a point about 5 metres east of its junction with Ma Tau Wai Road to a point about 60 metres east of the same junction;

(b)     the southern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from a point about 5 metres east of its junction with Ma Tau Wai Road to a point about 75 metres east of the same junction;

(c)     the section of Sung Chi Street from its junction with Hok Yuen Street to a point about 10 metres north of the same junction; and

(d)     the northern kerbside lane of Hok Yuen Street from its junction with Sung Chi Street to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones has been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will continue to be temporarily rescinded.


HO Kwong-hang, Patrick Commissioner for Transport (Acting)

道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
延長長沙灣福榮街臨時限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月31日下午6時起，至2024年7月31日下午6時止，福榮街由其與東京街交界起，至同一交界以東約65米處止的一段車路，全日24小時繼續暫劃為限制區。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zone on Fuk Wing Street, Cheung Sha Wan


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 p.m. on 31 May 2024 to 6.00 p.m. on 31 July 2024, the section of Fuk Wing Street from its junction with Tonkin Street to a point about 65 metres east of the same junction will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone has been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will continue to be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

道路交通（交通管制）規例（第374G章）

        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374章）第14（1）（b）條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月31日上午10時起，下列路段全日24小時劃為限制區：


(a)     牛頭角道由其與聯安街交界處起，至同一交界以西約15米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(b)     牛頭角道由其與聯安街交界處起，至同一交界以東約20米處止的北面路旁行車線;；

(c)     牛頭角道由其與馬蹄徑西面交界處起，至同一交界以西約50米處止的南面路旁行車線;

(d)     牛頭角道由其與馬蹄徑西面交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的南面路旁行車線;

(e)     牛頭角道由其與馬蹄徑東面交界處起，至同一交界以西約15米處止的南面路旁行車線;

(f)     牛頭角道由其與馬蹄徑東面交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的南面路旁行車線;

(g)     牛頭角道由其與通明街交界處起，至同一交界以西約15米處止的北面路旁行車線;

(h)     牛頭角道由其與通明街交界處起，至同一交界以東約25米處止的路段；

(i)     牛頭角道由其與康寧道交界以西起約15米處起，至同一交界以西約20米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(j)     牛頭角道由其與康寧道交界以西起約5米處起，至同一交界以西約20米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(k)     聯安街由其與牛頭角道交界處起，至同一交界以北約25米處止的路段；

(l)     馬蹄徑由其與牛頭角道西面交界處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(m)     馬蹄徑由其與牛頭角道西面交界處起，至同一交界以南約5米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(n)     馬蹄徑由其與牛頭角道東面交界處起，至同一交界以南約25米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(o)     馬蹄徑由其與牛頭角道東面交界處起，至同一交界以南約15米處止的東面路旁行車線；及

(p)     通明街由其與牛頭角道交界處起，至同一交界以北約20米處止的路段。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

Restricted Zones on Ngau Tau Kok Road, Luen On Street, Tung Ming Street
and Horseshoe Lane, Kwun Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 31 May 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from its junction with Luen On Street to a point about 15 metres west of the same junction;

(d)     the southern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from its western junction with Horse Shoe Lane to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction;

(e)     the southern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from its eastern junction with Horse Shoe Lane to a point about 15 metres west of the same junction;

(f)     the southern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from its eastern junction with Horse Shoe Lane to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction ;

(g)     the northern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from its junction with Tung Ming Street to a point about 15 metres west of the same junction ;

(h)     the section of Ngau Tau Kok Road from its junction with Tung Ming Street to a point about 25 metres east of the same junction ;

(i)     the northern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from a point about 15 metres west of its junction with Hong Ning Road to a point about 20 metres west of the same junction ;

(j)     the southern kerbside lane of Ngau Tau Kok Road from a point about 5 metres west of its junction with Hong Ning Road to a point about 20 metres west of the same junction ;

(k)     the section of Luen On Street from its junction with Ngau Tau Kok Road to a point about 25 metres north of the same junction ;

(l)     the western kerbside lane of Horse Shoe Lane from its western junction with Ngau Tau Kok Road to a point about 20 metres south of the same junction;

(m)     the eastern kerbside lane of Horse Shoe Lane from its western junction with Ngau Tau Kok Road to a point about 5 metres south of the same junction;

(n)     the western kerbside lane of Horse Shoe Lane from its eastern junction with Ngau Tau Kok Road to a point about 25 metres south of the same junction;

(o)     the eastern kerbside lane of Horse Shoe Lane from its eastern junction with Ngau Tau Kok Road to a point about 15 metres south of the same junction; and

(p)     the section of Tung Ming Street from its junction with Ngau Tau Kok Road to a point about 20 metres north of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

(f)     振華道由其與連接振華道體育館出口的未命名通路交界以北約15米處起，至同一交界以北約30米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(g)    振華道由其與連接振華道體育館入口的未命名通路交界以南約5米處起，至同一交界以南約15米處止的西面路旁行車線；及

(h)     振華道由其與連接振華道體育館出口的未命名通路交界處起，至同一交界以北約25米處止的東面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。


運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones On Chun Wah Road And Choi Ha Road, Kwun Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 22 May 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the southern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from a point about 25 metres east of its junction with Choi Ha Road to a point about 30 metres west of the same junction;

(b)     the northern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from its junction with Choi Ha Road to a point about 25 metres east of the same junction;

(c)     the northern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from its junction with Choi Ha Road to a point about 25 metres west of the same junction;

(d)     the eastern kerbside lane of Choi Ha Road from its junction with Chun Wah Road to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction; and

(e)     the western kerbside lane of Choi Ha Road from its junction with Chun Wah Road to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction;

(f)     the western kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from a point about 15 metres north of its junction with the unnamed access road connecting the egress of Chun Wah Road Sports Centre to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction;

(g)     the western kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from a point about 5 metres south of its junction with the unnamed access road connecting the ingress of Chun Wah Road Sports Centre to a point about 15 metres south of the same junction ; and

(h)     the eastern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from its junction with the unnamed access road connecting the egress of Chun Wah Road Sports Centre to a point about 25 metres north of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Bus and Goods Vehicle Restricted Zone on Renfrew Road, Kowloon Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 16 February 2024, the eastern kerbside of Renfrew Road from a point about 115 metres south of its junction with Baptist University Road to a point about 145 metres south of the same junction will be designated as bus and goods vehicle restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all buses and goods vehicles, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
延長油塘高輝道臨時限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年4月21日下午6時起，至2024年7月22日下午6時止，油塘下列路段繼續全日24小時暫劃為限制區：


(a)     高輝道由其與崇德圍交界處以東約120米處起，至同一交界處以東約195米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(b)     高輝道由其與崇德圍交界處以東約145米處起，至同一交界處以東約195米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(c)     高輝道由其與東源街交界處以西約50米處起，至同一交界處以東約55米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(d)     高輝道由其與東源街交界處以西約5米處起，至同一交界處以西約45米處止的南面路旁行車線；及

(e)     高輝道盡頭路的西面路旁。


        除經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zones on Ko Fai Road, Yau Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 pm on 21 April 2024 to 6.00 pm on 22 July 2024, the following road sections in Yau Tong will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     The northern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 120 metres east of its junction with Shung Tak Wai to a point about 195 metres east of the same junction;

(b)     The southern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 145 metres east of its junction with Shung Tak Wai to a point about 195 metres east of the same junction;

(c)     The northern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 50 metres west of its junction with Tung Yuen Street to a point about 55 metres east of the same junction;

(d)     The southern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 5 metres west of its junction with Tung Yuen Street to a point about 45 metres west of the same junction; and

(e)     The western kerbside of the cul-de-sac of Ko Fai Road.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from: -


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones have been indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通 (交通管制) 規例 (第374章，附屬法例G)
北角英皇道臨時限制區

本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374章，附屬法例G)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2023 年 10月3日上午7時起至2024年11月30日下午7時止，英皇道由其與炮台山道交界以西約40米處起，至同一交界以西約100米處止的南面路旁行車線將每日上午7時至上午10時及下午5時至下午7時暫劃為限制區。

        除巴士、學校私家小巴、的士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

        同時，現時每日上午8時至上午10時及下午5時至下午7時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (Chapter 374 SUB. LEG. G)
Temporary Restricted Zone on King's Road, North Point

In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374 sub. leg. G, I hereby direct that with effect from 7.00 a.m. on 3 October 2023 to 7.00 p.m. on 30 November 2024, the southern kerbside lane of King's Road from a point about 40 metres west of its junction with Fortress Hill Road to a point about 100 metres west of the same junction will be temporarily designated as a restricted zone from 7.00 a.m. to 10.00 a.m. and from 5.00 p.m. to 7.00 p.m. daily.

        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except buses, school private light buses, taxis and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:-

(a)  picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)  loading or unloading goods.


The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zone from 8.00 a.m. to 10.00 a.m. and from 5.00 p.m. to 7.00 p.m. daily on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zone in Tai Nan Street, Mong Kok


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulation, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 a.m. on 13 July 2024 to 7.00 p.m. on 14 July 2024, from 10.00 a.m. on 20 July 2024 to 7.00 p.m. on 21 July 2024, from 10.00 a.m. on 27 July 2024 to 7.00 p.m. on 28 July 2024 and from 10.00 a.m. on 3 August 2024 to 7.00 p.m. on 4 August 2024, the section of Tai Nan Street from a point about 25 meters north of its junction with Prince Edward Road West to a point about 50 meters north of the same junction will be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:-


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

道路交通 (交通管制) 規例（第374章）

中環德己立街限制區

　　本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374章) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2020年12月18日上午10時起，德己立街由其與和安里交界處起，至同一交界以南約25米處止的西面路旁行車線將全日24小時劃為限制區。

　　除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，所有機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a)   上落乘客；或

(b)   起卸貨物。

　　有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

　　同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。

運輸署署長羅淑佩

Restricted Zone in D'Aguilar Street, Central

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 18 December 2020, the western kerbside lane of D'Aguilar Street from its junction with Wo On Lane to a point about 25 metres south of the same junction will be designated as a restricted zone 24 hours daily.

        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a)   picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)   loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will be rescinded.

LAW Shuk-pui, Rosanna Commissioner for Transport

Notice:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
油麻地臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年6月7日上午10時起至2024年8月31日止，以下路段將全日24小時暫劃為限制區：-


(a)     介乎甘肅街與炮台街之間的一段新填地街；

(b)     甘肅街由其與上海街交界處起，至其與炮台街交界處止的南面路旁行車線；

(c)     炮台街由其與甘肅街交界處起，至同一交界以南約50米處止的東面路旁行車線(收費錶泊車位除外)；

(d)     炮台街由其與甘肅街交界處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的西面路旁行車線 (收費錶泊車位除外)；

(e)     澄平街由其與眾坊街交界處起，至同一交界以北約40米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(f)     澄平街由其與眾坊街交界處起，至同一交界以北約10米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(g)     眾坊街由其與澄平街交界處起，至同一交界以東約50米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(h)     眾坊街由其與澄平街交界處起，至同一交界以東約20米處止的南面路旁行車線；及

(i)     渡船街由其與甘肅街交界以南25米處起，至同一交界以南約45米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(j)     介乎渡船街與廣東道之間的一段西貢街；

(k)     偉晴街由其與西貢街交界處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的路段；

(l)     炮台街由其西貢街交界處起，至同一交界以北約20米處止的東面路旁行車線；及

(m)     炮台街由其與西貢街交界處起，至同一交界以北約10米處止的西面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內:


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones in Yau Ma Tei


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 7 June 2024 to 31 August 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the section of Reclamation Street between Kansu Street and Battery Street;

(b)     the southern kerbside lane of Kansu Street between Shanghai Street and Battery Street;

(c)     the eastern kerbside lane of Battery street from its junction with Kansu Street to a point about 50 metres south of the same junction (except metered parking spaces);

(d)     the western kerbside lane of Battery Street from its junction with Kansu Street to a point about 20 meters south of the same junction (except metered parking spaces);

(e)     the eastern kerbside lane of Ching Ping Street from its junction with Public Square Street to a point about 40 meters north of the same junction;

(f)     the western kerbside lane of Ching Ping Street from its junction with Public Square Street to a point about 10 meters north of the same junction;

(g)     the northern kerbside lane of Public Square Street from its junction with Ching Ping Street to a point about 50 meters east of the same junction;

(h)     the southern kerbside lane of Public Square Street from its junction with Ching Ping Street to a point about 20 meters east of the same junction;

(i)     the eastern kerbside lane of Ferry Street from a point about 25 metres south of its junction with Kansu Street to a point about 45 meters south of the same junction;

(j)     the section of Saigon Street between Ferry Street and Canton Road;

(k)     the section of Wai Ching Street from its junction with Saigon Street to a point about 20 metres south of the same junction;

(l)     the eastern kerbside lane of Battery Street from its junction with Saigon Street to a point about 20 metres north of the same junction; and

(m)     the western kerbside lane of Battery Street from its junction with Saigon Street to a point about 10 metres north of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
石硤尾巴域街及石硤尾街臨時限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年3月18日上午8時起，至2024年7月31日下午6時止，下列路段全日24小時暫劃為限制區:


(a)     巴域街由其與石硤尾街交界處起，至同一交界以西約50米處止的路段；及

(b)     石硤尾街由其與巴域街交界以北約15米處起，至同一交界以南約15米處止的西面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones on Berwick Street and Shek Kip Mei Street, Shek Kip Mei


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 8.00 a.m. on 18 March 2024 to 6.00 p.m. on 31 July 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the section of Berwick Street from its junction with Shek Kip Mei Street to a point about 50 metres west of the same junction; and

(b)     the western kerbside lane of Shek Kip Mei Street from a point about 15 metres north of its junction with Berwick Street to a point about 15 metres south of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

(b) loading or unloading goods.

The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

(b)     秀茂坪道由其與順安道交界以西約35米處起，至同一交界以東約35米處止的北面路旁行車線;及

(c)     順安道由其與秀茂坪道交界處起，至同一交界以北約30米處止的路段。
